## Description {#details}

One element in a JSON path: an object field (.foo) or array index &#91;27&#93;.

Exception: the root <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/path">Path</a> encodes a pointer to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/path/root">Path::Root</a>.

Definition at line 674 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/json-h">JSON.h</a>.
